channel.title: Aura help
channel.description: you add in aura but it goes in to the shield slot how can i make it fit in to the top left slot near helm? :palm: http://imgur.com/wDiXsLz

item.title: Aura help
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

In your itemassistant class, under the “boolean wearitem” or something like that, add each aura code in this format

switch (wearID) { case ****: targetSlot = 7; break; }

You need to replace 7 with the proper Aura slot ID, and add the item ID.

Edit : This is just a dirty fix, let me know if it works. In the mean time I’ll look for a permanent fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Aura help
item.dc:creator: @nervo nervo
item.description:
@nervo wrote:

I’ve messed around with it but nothing is happening

Read full topic

item.title: Aura help
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

If i’m not mistaken you should have this method in your ClickItem class

if(itemId == your aura itemid) { if(c.AuraEquiped > 1){ c.getItems().addItem(c.AuraEquiped, 1); } c.AuraEquiped = your aura itemid; c.getPA().sendFrame34(c.AuraEquiped, 0, 10794, 1); c.AuraEffect = 1; c.getItems().deleteItem(your aura itemid,c.getItems().getItemSlot(your aura itemid),1); }

Edit : you may have to adjust it to fit your code. Unless you already have that , let me know.

Read full topic
